summary: Adds doors to all three bedrooms in Hjerim.  Requires Hearthfire!
descriptionHtml:
A small mod that adds doors to all three bedrooms in Hjerim. The doors are open by default, but can be closed. Requires Hearthfire!

(If you don't have Hearthfire, I recommend the "Doors - Hjerim" file from Jokerine's mod, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32563]Some Privacy, Please[/url].)

This mod has been cleaned with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/]TES5Edit[/url].

Also available on the [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=130137842]Steam Workshop[/url].
author: Aaron of Minneapolis
